amendment.description: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent USDA from using funds for certain courses, books and study guides.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prevents the Agriculture Department from using funds for certain courses, books, and study guides.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 214 (Roll no. 421).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 214 (Roll no. 421).
